availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph B. Burnside (Garrard County, Kentucky, trader, Prov Govt Council Rep )

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, trader and provisional government council member. Kentucky native. Son of Williamson G. Burnside and Elizabeth Burnside. Trader in Garrard County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the council of ten of the provisional government of Kentucky in 1861. Member of the Committee on Ways and Means for the Provisional Government of Kentucky in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Division 1, p. 249A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, p. 706.
KYR-0004-033-0004.
